channel.title: RuneReverse V2
channel.description:
[ul][list][img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/DSPK/runereverse.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/255ifqc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/qwygwp.png[/img]
[b]Attackable NPCs: Est. 131 And Counting[/b] [b] Usable Items: Still Counting[/b]
I sat and thought about what Team_Rocket said today, and I realized I have been rushing these things and actually not really been taking the time to actually make sure their how I want them. So what I decided to do is not update the goal list until I'm complete with the ones on my list till I'm satisfied with EVERYTHING. So I would like to thank him for bringing that to my attention!
[b]Monsters[/b] We also have TONS (or will have) of monsters to defeat. I'm planning on having over 100 monsters if their aren't that many already to kill in the game. I also raked up a list of bosses I'm going to add and I think I have over 40. Some bosses will be featured in Minigames, others just to kill around the world. Speaking of world, we're opening a lot of it up to public! :O I know people will like some of the bosses because I found some that I didn't even know existed. Each monster will have it's own unique drops.
[b]Items[/b] All items will have their place. A lot of the rare ones will be in the drops (as they usually are). Some of the items are custom (everyone loves customs :D If you don't your gay) and will be placed in very unique ways. I may also try to release some new items that most other servers don't have. If you have any suggestions, please post! :D
[b]Quests[/b] I plan on adding some quests, probably nothing giant just some simple go and collect quests maybe a few with a monster fights. Instead of calling them quests though I'm going to call them adventures and Make an all new tab for it. The 2 I already have planned out are into the inferno and kitty hunting (dont worry, no cats get hurt :P).
[b]Objects[/b] I'm kinda tired of seeing the same objects used for the same things on every server, so I may try to replace some objects with new ones.
[b]Skills[/b] In this server, I will be concentrating on Slayer. I'm planning on adding 4 slayer masters and 4 slayer task levels (Easy (level 1), Medium (level 50), Hard (level 80), Elite (new)(Level 95). I will try to make a lot of the slayer items work. I'll also be having 3 actual RS slayer areas, 4 Strykewyrm areas (Jungle, Ice, Dessert, Wild) and everywhere else on the map. Going back to the task level, Elite is going to be hard monsters, such as bosses and other level 200+ monsters. I will also re-code it and try to make it more stable. Another skill I would love to work with is agility. Not necessarily with the skill training itself, but with things such as shortcuts.
[b]Staff[/b]
1. Frank (kronixz) (Coder)
[b][u]Supporters[/u][/b]
[b][u]To Do[/u][/b] Red = Not Started Blue = In Progress Green = Done
Pathfinding
Stability [list] [li]Fix all NullPointer errors[/li] [li]Find and Fix Deadlocks[/li] [li]Find and Fix Memory Leaks[/li][/list]
Website [list] [li]Buy Domain[/li] [li]Get SMF[/li] [list] [li]Get Theme[/li] [/list] [li]Build Website[/li] [list] [li]Mobile Site (for iPod and other smart phones)[/li] [li]Advertisements[/li] [li]All Links[/li][/list] [li]Server to Site/Site to Server[/li] [list] [li]Auto Donations[/li] [li]Vote4Points[/li] [li]Must Register An Account To Play On Server (or if you log in to server, it will make a forums account)[/li] [li]Online Offense Appeal System (as well as ingame)[/li] [/list] [li]MORE COMING SOON![/li] [/list]
[b][u]Updates:[/u][/b] [/list][/ul] [code][12.29.11] - Got source (added frank to dropbox =]) - runewings317 & frank - Moved Home (might do some updates when online orso) - runewings317 - New Skilling Area (50%) - frank - Added PK box (75%) - frank - Made New Login Screen - runewings317 - Made New Titlebox and Title Buttons - runewings317 - Made New Banner - runewings317 - Added Slayer Ring 50% - runewings317 [12.30.11] - fixed up rock crabs - (not important :P) - frank - Fixed Byte Memory Leak! :D - runewings317 -added theiving and all altars at home - Frank -PK box finished - Frank -added a ::setlevel command :O -frank -added ::register - runewings317 :\ -quest tab - frank not done -removed summoning - runewings317 -Made only 1 connection per IP - RuneWings317 -Fixed NullPointer Error! - RuneWings317 -changed start location and respawn location - RuneWings317 -animated and spawned Strykewyrms - RuneWings317 -Slayer Ring Complete! :D -talking npcs added and an ::info command .. ::rules isnt finished -FunPK completed with teleport working! - Frank -skilling zone FINISHED :D - frank [12.31.11] -animated Phoenix, Skelital Horror, Penence Queen, Statue Ork, ogre and ourg - RuneWings317 -added Relleka Slayer Dungeon spawns - RuneWings317 -Got some information on RockTails and other things needed - Frank -Started Turkey Points base :) [1.1.11] -completely animated the monsters in Relleka Slayer Dungeon! - RuneWings317 [1.2.11] -added spawns to lummy slayer dungeon - runewings317 -started new monster teleport interface - frank [1.3.11] -added rocktail and cavefish fishing and cooking done - runewings317 -added slayer master to lummy slayer dungeon and finished up some npc animations - runewings317 [Sometime between 1.4.11 - 1.7.11] -Finished up the lummy slayer dungeon - RuneWings317 -Added new monsters to the slayer task list - RuneWings317 -Cleaned out the files - RuneWings317 -Made new classes for agility and hunting - RuneWings317 -Added some new crowns - Frank -Some other things we did... I'll do it later when I remember :I [1.8.11] -Fixed all the items, cache packed them and reduced cache size! :D -RuneWings317 [/code]
[u][b]Media:[/b][/u] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/RuneReverse/Capture.PNG[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/RuneReverse/pic1.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/RuneReverse/2.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/RuneReverse/3.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/RuneReverse/zaros.PNG[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/RuneReverse/Untitled.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/RuneReverse/home%20copy.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/RuneReverse/donor.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/RuneReverse/aquanite.gif[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/RuneReverse/phoenix.gif[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/RuneReverse/queen.gif[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/RuneReverse/roc.gif[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/RuneReverse/horror.gif[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/RuneReverse/jadevine.gif[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/RuneReverse/muspah.gif[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/RuneReverse/nex.gif[/img]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G8eHolY-7F8&feature=mfu_in_order&list=UL[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HT9an5nPUwM&feature=youtube_gdata[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p2PTPybXG5g&feature=youtube_gdata[/youtube]

Want to support RuneReverse? [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/RuneReverse/support.png[/img]
Put this in your signature on MoparScape: [code][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,523366.0.html]I support RuneReverse![/url][/code]
And this on any site that allows images in their signatures: [code][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,523366.0.html][img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/RuneReverse/support.png[/img][/url][/code]

item.title: RuneReverse V2
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[ul][list]

Attackable NPCs: Est. 131 And Counting
Usable Items: Still Counting

I sat and thought about what Team_Rocket said today, and I realized I have been rushing these things and actually not really been taking the time to actually make sure their how I want them. So what I decided to do is not update the goal list until I’m complete with the ones on my list till I’m satisfied with EVERYTHING. So I would like to thank him for bringing that to my attention!

Monsters
We also have TONS (or will have) of monsters to defeat. I’m planning on having over 100 monsters if their aren’t that many already to kill in the game. I also raked up a list of bosses I’m going to add and I think I have over 40. Some bosses will be featured in Minigames, others just to kill around the world. Speaking of world, we’re opening a lot of it up to public! I know people will like some of the bosses because I found some that I didn’t even know existed. Each monster will have it’s own unique drops.

Items
All items will have their place. A lot of the rare ones will be in the drops (as they usually are). Some of the items are custom (everyone loves customs If you don’t your gay) and will be placed in very unique ways. I may also try to release some new items that most other servers don’t have. If you have any suggestions, please post!

Quests
I plan on adding some quests, probably nothing giant just some simple go and collect quests maybe a few with a monster fights. Instead of calling them quests though I’m going to call them adventures and Make an all new tab for it. The 2 I already have planned out are into the inferno and kitty hunting (dont worry, no cats get hurt :P).

Objects
I’m kinda tired of seeing the same objects used for the same things on every server, so I may try to replace some objects with new ones.

Skills
In this server, I will be concentrating on Slayer. I’m planning on adding 4 slayer masters and 4 slayer task levels (Easy (level 1), Medium (level 50), Hard (level 80), Elite (new)(Level 95). I will try to make a lot of the slayer items work. I’ll also be having 3 actual RS slayer areas, 4 Strykewyrm areas (Jungle, Ice, Dessert, Wild) and everywhere else on the map. Going back to the task level, Elite is going to be hard monsters, such as bosses and other level 200+ monsters. I will also re-code it and try to make it more stable. Another skill I would love to work with is agility. Not necessarily with the skill training itself, but with things such as shortcuts.

Staff

  1. Frank (kronixz) (Coder)

Supporters

To Do
Red = Not Started
Blue = In Progress
Green = Done

Pathfinding

Stability
[list]
[li]Fix all NullPointer errors[/li]
[li]Find and Fix Deadlocks[/li]
[li]Find and Fix Memory Leaks[/li][/list]

Website
[list]
[li]Buy Domain[/li]
[li]Get SMF[/li]
[list]
[li]Get Theme[/li]
[/list]
[li]Build Website[/li]
[list]
[li]Mobile Site (for iPod and other smart phones)[/li]
[li]Advertisements[/li]
[li]All Links[/li][/list]
[li]Server to Site/Site to Server[/li]
[list]
[li]Auto Donations[/li]
[li]Vote4Points[/li]
[li]Must Register An Account To Play On Server (or if you log in to server, it will make a forums account)[/li]
[li]Online Offense Appeal System (as well as ingame)[/li]
[/list]
[li]MORE COMING SOON![/li]
[/list]

Updates:
[/list][/ul]

[code][12.29.11]

  • Got source (added frank to dropbox =]) - runewings317 & frank
  • Moved Home (might do some updates when online orso) - runewings317
  • New Skilling Area (50%) - frank
  • Added PK box (75%) - frank
  • Made New Login Screen - runewings317
  • Made New Titlebox and Title Buttons - runewings317
  • Made New Banner - runewings317
  • Added Slayer Ring 50% - runewings317
    [12.30.11]
  • fixed up rock crabs - (not important :P) - frank
  • Fixed Byte Memory Leak! - runewings317
    -added theiving and all altars at home - Frank
    -PK box finished - Frank
    -added a ::setlevel command -frank
    -added ::register - runewings317 :\
    -quest tab - frank not done
    -removed summoning - runewings317
    -Made only 1 connection per IP - RuneWings317
    -Fixed NullPointer Error! - RuneWings317
    -changed start location and respawn location - RuneWings317
    -animated and spawned Strykewyrms - RuneWings317
    -Slayer Ring Complete!
    -talking npcs added and an ::info command … ::rules isnt finished
    -FunPK completed with teleport working! - Frank
    -skilling zone FINISHED - frank
    [12.31.11]
    -animated Phoenix, Skelital Horror, Penence Queen, Statue Ork, ogre and ourg - RuneWings317
    -added Relleka Slayer Dungeon spawns - RuneWings317
    -Got some information on RockTails and other things needed - Frank
    -Started Turkey Points base
    [1.1.11]
    -completely animated the monsters in Relleka Slayer Dungeon! - RuneWings317
    [1.2.11]
    -added spawns to lummy slayer dungeon - runewings317
    -started new monster teleport interface - frank
    [1.3.11]
    -added rocktail and cavefish fishing and cooking done - runewings317
    -added slayer master to lummy slayer dungeon and finished up some npc animations - runewings317
    [Sometime between 1.4.11 - 1.7.11]
    -Finished up the lummy slayer dungeon - RuneWings317
    -Added new monsters to the slayer task list - RuneWings317
    -Cleaned out the files - RuneWings317
    -Made new classes for agility and hunting - RuneWings317
    -Added some new crowns - Frank
    -Some other things we did… I’ll do it later when I remember :I
    [1.8.11]
    -Fixed all the items, cache packed them and reduced cache size! -RuneWings317
    [/code]
